textMessages.orDragDrop: Or drag and drop files below

values.title: Workflow
values.value: Pick an image, set Image parameters and Model parameters. Then refresh view to see the results. If autodownload is set, the STL will download each time you refresh.

values.title: Max Size
values.value: The largest X or Y dimension of the output lithophane - X if original image wide, Y if high.

values.title: Thickness
values.value: The maximum Z dimension of the output lithophane.

values.title: Border
values.value: The thickness of the border around the edge.

values.title: Thinnest layer
values.value: This is the minumum layer thickness (for the brightest pixels in the image).

values.title: Vectors per pixel
values.value: Each of the pixels in the image is translated into a number of 3D points on the surface of the lithophane, the larger this number, the more detailed the output (and the larger the STL file/slower the processing) 2 is a good value for this you can go up to 5, but it will take time and use memory.

values.title: Base/Stand depth
values.value: A small stand on the base for when printing vertically. Positive number for base coming forward, negative for backward.

values.title: Curve
values.value: Number of degrees to curve the surface (for the curved forms).

values.title: Positive Image
values.value: Set to Positive Image, lighter areas of the original image will be thinner in the output and the thicker if set to Negative Image.

values.title: Mirror Image
values.value: Set to Mirror Image, the image will be mirrored about the X axis (for rear viewing), otherwise the output will be in the same orientation as the original image.

values.title: Flip Image
values.value: Set to File Image, the image will be fliped about the Y axis, otherwise the output will be in the same orientation as the original image.

values.title: Manual Refresh
values.value: Set to Manual Refresh to only recreate the model when the 'Refresh' button is pressed, set to Automatic if you'd like the model to refresh when you select the image

values.title: Repeat X Count
values.value: Set to repeat the image in the X direction prior to creating the output.

values.title: Repeat Y Count
values.value: Set to repeat the image in the Y direction prior to creating the output.

values.title: Mirror Repeat
values.value: Set to alternately mirror the image when the X Repeat setting is being used.

values.title: Flip Repeat
values.value: Set to alternately flip the image when the Y Repeat setting is being used.

values.title: Binary STL
values.value: Set to use a binary (smaller and faster) STL file format, otherwise use ASCII where needed for compatibility with other software.

values.title: Manual Download
values.value: If set to Automatic, the STL file will download each time you refresh the model, if set to Manula, the download will only happen when you press the download button.

values.title: Form
values.value: Select the form of the output model from the following types

values.title: Flat
values.value: A rectangular model with the image impressed in one face. Curve setting is ignoed

values.title: Inner Curve
values.value: A curved rectangular model with the image impressed on the inner face. Use curve setting to set the number of degrees in the arc.

values.title: Outer Curve
values.value: A curved rectangular model with the image impressed on the outer face. Use curve setting to set the number of degrees in the arc.

values.title: Solid Cylinder
values.value: A cylindrical model with the image impressed on the curved face.

values.title: Rectangular Pillow
values.value: A rectangular pillow model with the image impressed on the top face

values.title: Dome - Image on Top
values.value: A circular dome model with the image impressed as if from above the dome

values.title: Dome - Image on Side
values.value: A circular dome model with the image impressed as if from the edge of the dome with the image wrapping the perimeter of the dome and the top of the image meeting in the centre

values.title: Heart
values.value: A heart shaped model with the image impressed on the curved faces
